title: Video: Dad Rocks! – Mount Modern
body: When he’s talking to his friends, **[Dad Rocks!](http://dadrocks.tumblr.com/ "Dad Rocks! Tumblr")** goes by the name of **Snævar Njáll Albertsson**, and he’s also likely to be found playing guitar, trumpet and singing in incredible Danish band **[Mimas](http://www.myspace.com/mimas "Mimas Myspace")**, who sound something like **Do Make Say Think** would if they dropped all the austerity and starting smiling more. **Snævar** will be releasing his full length debut as **Dad Rocks!** on November 8th via Big Scary Monsters in the UK, Paper Garden Records in the US, and Kimi Records in Iceland. It’s called **_Mount Modern_** and the video for its opening title track can be found below. On the track, **Albertsson** couples the ghostly trumpet and innovative vocal lines **Mimas** devotees have come to know and love with intricate fingerpicking, delicate piano, and aching strings to create a beautiful teaser that has excited for the full length. And all set to a watercolour and ink stop-motion video with a wolf and a paper aeroplane in it, by Jollan Aurelio of **[Heister](http://www.myspace.com/heistertheband "Heister myspace")**. Winner.
